divs: Sighting DetailsIm 68 years old and I need to tell what I saw,other than my family.this was many years ago,in 1956,in San Antonio,Texas,I went over to a friends house to have dinner with her and her family,afterwards she and I went out side to sit on the "stoop"as we called it,where the sidewalk goes down to the street,there were 3 steps and we sat down like we always did and then laid back on the warm sidewalk from the heat of the day,we were looking up into the sky,which was a very clear nite and we could see thousands of stars,We just tried to find the stars we knew and the mikley way and then the air just seamed to get so still and it became very quiet.we sat up and all of a sudden there was this Huge round light,so very bright(like the ones they put up at a County fair,and light up the sky,but this light was thousands of times brighter,I put my hand in front of my face to shield the light so I could see just what it was,we started to scream and her Parents and sister and brother came running out of the front door onto the porch and the light went faster than a lighting strike to the porch,it lit up their house and porch and they looked like they were frozen,as it was shining on them we could see just how big this disk was and it was HUGE,there were all of the red,blue,white,and a few green lights going all around it,and there were all kinds of strange pipe-like rods on it,and several windows,it moved very slow kind of rotateing just a little but stayed is the same place,there was no sound,no air moving the trees,it just hovered over all of us,then as fast as it came it was gone.We got up and ran to the porch and it was as if we were moving very slow.As we reached the porch he parents did not say a word to us,nor did her sister or brother,we all went into the house and her father called my Dad to come over.When go got there my friends Dad told him what had happened,and he needed to take me home,they were scared to death.At that time my Dad had woked at Kelly field for many years,and her Dad asked him to see if he could find out something about just what we saw,when we got home her called a friend who was a Major in the security divison at Kelly,he told him what we saw and asked him to see if anything had come across on the radar,he called back later and that is when things got very hairy,if you know what I mean.Dad worked un a Gen.Ramey and others and went to all of the bases you have shown on the show.several of the Officers came to the house and talked to me,then went to my friends home.We were told to NOT Tell anyone,but Dad kept on it.My friend and her family never said a word after all of the Officers went to their home,but Dads friend told us there was something on the radar,and that was all he was going to say.For years while sleeping at nite,I would be awakened by a very bright lite,this went on for many years,I asked my friend if she had they same thing going on and she said yes,but did not tell her folks,and that she had not told anyone about what we saw and her family never did either. Dad has passed and Mom is 99.I have told my husband and children and grandson about it,and as far as my friend I do not know where she is,and her family are all gone now.I need to tell you about this more,I can still see it in my mind,I will never forget what I saw and I keep looking to the nite sky to see if it will come back.Please let me know if you know anything about this from texas during the summer of 1956.Thank You Sharon
